title: Lugribossk
html:
Lugribossk

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
H Lugribossk (No tile)
Difficulty 36
Attacks Weapon 8d8 physical, Tentacle 1d4 int drain, Tentacle 1d2 int drain, Tentacle 1d2 int drain, Cast 0d6 mage spell, Cast 2d8 clerical spell
H Lugribossk (No tile)
Difficulty 36
Attacks

Weapon 8d8 physical, Tentacle 1d4 int drain, Tentacle 1d2 int drain, Tentacle 1d2 int drain, Cast 0d6 mage spell, Cast 2d8 clerical spell

Base level 27
Base experience 1202
Speed 18
Base AC 0
Base MR 60
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium
Resistances sleep, poison
Resistances conveyed sleep

Lugribossk:

  • can fly.
  • can survive underwater.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is an overlord to its kind.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • may turn against you when tame.
  • cannot be tamed.

Lugribossk, H, is a monster in dNetHack.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
